programme.title: Bent
programme.desc: A discredited former cop connects a murder case to an elaborate conspiracy involving high-stakes treason.

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: Sam Childers (Gerard Butler), a former biker, travels to Africa to establish an orphanage for young victims of war.

programme.title: Machete Kills
programme.desc: The president recruits ex-Federale Machete (Danny Trejo) to take down an eccentric arms dealer who plans to spread war and anarchy throughout the world.

programme.title: Standoff
programme.desc: Armed with a shotgun and one bullet, a war veteran (Thomas Jane) tries to protect a young murder witness from a ruthless assassin (Laurence Fishburne).

programme.title: Romeo Is Bleeding
programme.desc: A double life catches up to a New York policeman (Gary Oldman) when he meets a mob hit-woman (Lena Olin) from Moscow.

programme.title: I Am Wrath
programme.desc: A man sets out to get his own justice after police are unable to catch his wife's killer.

programme.title: Knock Off
programme.desc: Hong Kong business partners (Jean-Claude Van Damme, Rob Schneider) tangle with villains smuggling miniature explosive devices.

programme.title: Tekken
programme.desc: Jin (Jon Foo) trains to fight Anvil after he witnesses him murdering his mother.

programme.title: Matador
programme.desc: Agent Tony Bravo is recruited by the CIA to go undercover as a member of the L.A. Riot soccer team.

programme.title: Matador
programme.desc: The team tracks a hired assassin with the help of the codes stolen from Gideon Khan's tablet; Tony must protect the target.

programme.title: Matador
programme.desc: Tony goes to an auction with Margot; Tony and Galan reach a new level of understanding; reporter Reyna Flores gets closer to uncovering the truth about Tony.

programme.title: Matador
programme.desc: Tony must rescue Galan's daughter; Annie and Noah come to a realization about Galan.

programme.title: Matador
programme.desc: Tony, Holester and Caesar take Galan's private jet to Nicaragua, where a drug cartel leader rules; Tony gets help from a friend in the DEA.

programme.title: Matador
programme.desc: Galan trusts Tony to deliver a package, but Reyna follows; the CIA rescues an anthropology professor.

programme.title: Fled
programme.desc: Escaped convicts (Laurence Fishburne, Stephen Baldwin) fight while they evade authorities seeking a computer disk on Cuban mobsters.

programme.title: Dead Trigger
programme.desc: In the near future, a deadly virus has killed billions and turned many others into bloodthirsty zombies. Unable to stop the spread of the virus, the government recruits an elite team to combat the zombie menace.

programme.title: Steel Dawn
programme.desc: A post-World War III swordsman (Patrick Swayze) defends a desert widow (Lisa Niemi) and her water-treatment farm.

programme.title: End of a Gun
programme.desc: A former DEA agent (Steven Seagal) strikes a deal to help a mysterious and seductive woman steal $2 million from a sadistic drug lord.
